name: US SERVICE ANIMALS (USSA)
description: Provide patients with expert diagnosis and registration for emotional support animals.
sampleDescriptions: Informational engagement with policymakers/regulators on benefits of Emotional Support Animals (ESAs) and USSAs standards and practices.  Provide input on potential regulatory action.
